message.content:
cs.IT, cs.NI, cs.DC, cs.SI, cs.CC. 

This paper deals with the problem of designing efficient feedback-based scheduling policies for chunked codes over packet networks with delay and loss. This problem is related to information theory (cs.IT) as it involves coding and transmission of information over a network. It also involves network infrastructure (cs.NI) as it deals with scheduling policies for packet transmission over a network. The paper also considers loss and delay models of the link, which are related to distributed computing (cs.DC) and systems and control (cs.SI). Finally, the paper proposes a new scheduling policy, which is a type of network coding (cs.CC).
